text: I would like to book a banquet
Ciao! It's wonderful to hear you're looking to book a banquet. Let’s make it a special occasion! What type of event are you planning? Is it a wedding, a birthday, or something corporate perhaps? 🌟
Che bellezza! A graduation party sounds fantastic! 🎓 Now, what date do you have in mind for this celebration?
Perfetto! November 1st, 2025 is noted! Now, what time are you thinking of starting your festivity?
Ottimo! A lovely time for a celebration! So, how many guests are you expecting to join in the fun? 🥳
Fantastic! A cozy gathering of 25 guests will be lovely! Now, do you have any food preferences or special menu requests for your graduation party? Maybe some favorites that you’d like to include? 🍝🍰
Delicious choices! Pasta and cake will certainly make for a delightful meal! 🍝🎂 Now, could you please share your email address so I can send you the confirmation details?
Grazie, Antonio! And lastly, could I have your phone number just in case we need to reach you with any updates? 📞
